title: Phone call feedback noise
content:
on a pixel 2 , regular phone calls ,
the other side of the conversation is hearing themselfs with a 0.8 second delay , and only the low frequencys , sounds very mumble and noisy.
they can hear me perfectly , i can hear them perfectly , but there is a constant echo only they can hear , i cant hear it on my side.
it only happens with regular calls , only when using the phone without a speaker,
with bluetooth headphones thers not a problem.

All is updated to latest version ,
i did try all the tweaks i could find related to audio, 
and eventually did a factory reset , 
and it didnt solve it.

I also try without a protective case , without a glass cover and it didnt help.
did try to cover the suround mix for maybe they do noise canceling and the problem is maybe on that area of the phone , but that didnt help it completely so its hard to know if thats the case.

i think i should just completely disable any active noise canceling during calls , but there is no option to do so.

thank you
